name: SMAZE
description:
So this is my first game and i wanted to make a game where it is basically snake mixed with the most impossible game but it turned out as the most impossible game but reskinned instead of having snake physics. So have fun and have a good day!

Btw its arrow keys to move. The apples are the thing that gets you to the next level. You cant touch rocks, trees or eagles. There are only ten levels but you wont beat it.

Btw 2 It pops up as a unrecognized app but just run it anyway I don't know how to stop it from doing that.
